title: How do I run smart devices from my Google Assistant when my phone is locked?
content: I have added Smart Outlets, Rokus and a Rachio irrigation system to my Google Home, but can't control any of them with Google Assistant when the phone is locked. I've changed the assistant settings to allow it to do tasks while locked, but it just won't run the devices. It tells me I need to unlock the phone.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
